name: Spiritomb
author: sui
flavor_text: Exactly 108 spirits gathered to become this Pokémon. Apparently there are some ill-natured spirits in the mix.

abilities.name: Cursed Message
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent’s Pokémon, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Chain of Spirits
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 more damage for each Spiritomb in your discard pile.
